subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin’s theme for the season was “Talk is Cheap. Play the game.” But with five days still to go before Super Bowl XLII, receiver Plaxico Burress couldn’t help himself.
snippet: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin’s theme for the season was “Talk is Cheap. Play the game.” But with five days still to go before Super Bowl XLII, receiver Plaxico Burress couldn’t help himself.
